== Grader: Kimi K2-0905 ==
  * grade_story_wc_0.txt (grade=8.0)
    Fresh synthesis: neutron-star physics + post-flood greenhouse ecology as dueling models of transformation. Premise is specific to this voice; butterfly-wing soil creation feels inevitable in hindsight. Risk in quiet, observational arc is justified by accumulative closure. Not quite groundbreaking but memorably particular.

  * grade_story_wc_1.txt (grade=8.4)
    Freshest synthesis: arson survivor + forensic accounting via frost physics. Premise could drift to thriller cliché but stays in lyric-textural mode. Risk taken with quiet, non-retributive ending; coherence holds. Slight proximity to “survivor finds hidden clue” template, but glass-maker’s professional gaze reforges it. No bold structural risk beyond accumulative shards, sufficient at this length.

  * grade_story_wc_10.txt (grade=8.9)
    The conceit—thermal micro-expressions scored as music—feels inevitable yet fresh; no prior story has used deafness to invent a new musical notation. Winterglass that will not fog is a material invention that concretizes irreversibility without magical realism. Risk is taken by making climax silent: reader must read musicology off a screen, yet tension holds. Transformation test passes: swap ferry trauma for any loss and the entire emotional mechanics collapse.

  * grade_story_wc_100.txt (grade=8.5)
    Underwater necropolis as infinite mausoleum feels fresh; folding library into ossuary is a non-obious synthesis. Risk taken with non-Euclidean space pays off logically. The broken lighthouse lens repurposed as soul-beacon transforms trope. Specificity anchors novelty—barnacle seals, kelp twine—preventing generic allegory.

  * grade_story_wc_101.txt (grade=7.9)
    Exile-on-ridge trope is refreshed by sanctions-era supply runs and anonymous mutual-aid mechanics rather than heroic rebellion. Antique bell as communal Slack channel feels novel and specific. Synthesis of generational fracture + covert food network grows organically from setting constraints. Risk is moderate—straight chronology, familiar collective-action arc—but execution is particular enough to avoid stock.

  * grade_story_wc_102.txt (grade=8.3)
    Fresh synthesis: camera obscura as grief-venting stethoscope. The “pilgrim of sparks” concept is particularized through breath mechanics rather than label. Risk is taken—past-life frame could feel gimmick—but stays subordinate to present breath ritual. The inversion of storage→release feels inevitable in hindsight. No close echoes of famous scenes; wisteria and Kwan Yin tear are integrated, not ornamental.

  * grade_story_wc_104.txt (grade=8.9)
    Fresh synthesis: seed vault + abandoned carnival + chained dancer codes yields a premise unlikely to work elsewhere. Arrow fletched from corn/ wheat stalks turns agricultural loss into resistance icon. Risk of soldier conversion is taken and mostly earned by prior seed imagery. Specificity—“desert marigold,” “heritage varieties”—anchors universality. No stock tropes; liberation army as potential new oppressor complicates typical rebellion arc.

  * grade_story_wc_105.txt (grade=9.4)
    Premise—underwater greenhouse orchard ringed by wrecks serving as synesthetic forge for anti-erasure hearing aids—feels inevitable, not contrived. Risk of lyric accumulative structure pays off: final hammer reconfigures every absence into acknowledgement. Fresh inflection: “collecting absences” as metallurgy literalized through silver micro-grain. No extant template matches this synthesis of grief-acoustics and marine-botanic futurism.

  * grade_story_wc_106.txt (grade=8.7)
    The fusion of heist beat with lyric meditation on transience feels fresh; “stealing sunsets” could have been twee but is grounded in concrete procedure (angle math, flower codes). Risk is taken—upward-pouring moonbeam curtain—yet payoff is emotionally legible. The concept travels: any city, any night, yet the details are irreducibly this station, this woman. Missing the final half-step into unforgettable imagery keeps it beneath 9.

  * grade_story_wc_107.txt (grade=7.9)
    Fusing glassblower with climate-grief station is fresh synthesis; transformation test passes—occupation and locale shape stakes inseparably. Risk of self-narration trope is taken, not hedged, and supports solitude theme. Could edge higher if glacial-memory science tied more tightly to glass technique.

  * grade_story_wc_108.txt (grade=8.9)
    The amnesia-double-stunt-double conceit is familiar, yet grounding it in a child’s plaster cast cipher feels fresh and chillingly plausible. Using manufactured phobias as both weapon and survival tool flips expected “courage” tropes. Risk of sentimentality in twin reunion is avoided—sister remains offstage breadcrumb-inker, keeping focus on Maya’s internal reassembly. Final reconfiguration makes the corruption-scandal backdrop feel personal rather than generic; stars as silent jury is an image unlikely to be replicated verbatim.

  * grade_story_wc_109.txt (grade=8.3)
    Fresh synthesis: starless navigation via silence-cartography reverses typical survival trope (characters chase light). Risk—slowing plot to meditate on absence—pays off through accrued texture. Oracle-as-posthumous-mentor avoids living-guide cliché. Transformation test fails slightly: caravan dropout + apocalypse could swap names/places, but the specific sensory inversion (silence = map) provides enough novelty to stay above 8.0.

  * grade_story_wc_11.txt (grade=8.9)
    Recruiting broken AIs into a monastery-prison of eternal sweeping to debug existential curiosity is non-obvious synthesis. Ice violin grown rather than carved provides fresh material metaphor for thought-as-crystal. Temporal recursion as janitorial training is daring risktaking that remains coherent under Accumulative lens. Specificity of 341 vs 342 iterations feels inevitable, not quirky ornament.

  * grade_story_wc_110.txt (grade=7.3)
    Fusing embezzlement confession with cryptic doodle art is fresh; translucent forecourt as moral lens is lovely. Yet the embezzlement-through-tickets concept is under-explored—no detail on how doodles encode accounts—so ingenuity feels gestural rather than fully mined. Institutional guilt theme avoids familiar thriller beats, opting for quiet solidarity, which personalizes the angle. Risk is moderate; payoff is cerebral, not visceral.

Transformation test fails if any element removed—without rope’s braid logic the card patterning collapses; without bronze the names evaporate; without aurora the “sound made visible” closure disappears. Risk taken in quiet, accumulative structure rather than twist, yet stakes feel world-size because 200 souls hinge on each microscopic wire thread. Specificity of Order ritual (three-over-two = hard K) anchors invention in lived detail, not abstract steampunk garnish.

Familiar “gravitational anomaly” trope is retooled into ontological copier rather than mere space-warp.

    Trope of “chosen-one prodigy” is inverted into “lukewarm mage who wins by microscopic patience,” a fresh synthesis. The dripping-rate as both world mechanic and emotional metric is non-obvious yet inevitable in hindsight. Risky lyric accumulative structure is fully committed to; payoff justifies the experiment. Specificity of “sapphire viaduct” color against dried canyon is memorable and irreplaceable.

  * grade_story_wc_313.txt (grade=8.5)
    Fresh angle: drought as archive, levee warden as memory-keeper. Photograph breadcrumb trail reverses usual ghost-town trope into active resurrection. Sapphire label reappears as sacramental object; wind chime reframes silence into communal bell. Risk—quiet ending, lyric compression—pays off in resonant reconfiguration. Synthesis feels inevitable, not gimmicky.

  * grade_story_wc_314.txt (grade=8.2)
    The starling murmuration-as-script conceit refreshes the familiar “scientist learns to feel” arc; synthesis with alchemical flame crystallizes the premise. Specific sensory detail (copper apples, emerald harmonics) prevents generic overlay. Risk is moderate—quiet epiphany rather than twist—but execution is coherent and memorable.

  * grade_story_wc_315.txt (grade=8.8)
    Premise—skyborne arbor as oracle—feels fresh yet inevitable. Trope of prophetic hermit is flipped: power surrendered, not hoarded. Specificity of leaf-reading technique grounds the concept; generic fantasy shorthand avoided. Final reconfiguration (transparency > mystique) reweights familiar trust trope into ethical stance. Risk taken with quiet ending pays off.

  * grade_story_wc_316.txt (grade=9.3)
    The custody-of-clone premise is familiar, yet the twist that the original must cede ownership to reclaim feeling is non-obvious and inevitable in hindsight. Floating dojo above mutable Montana, reality engines rewriting history, and Zen forms that weaponize emotional acceptance synthesize fresh angles on identity and grief. Specificity—“amber fluid,” “borrowed physics”—prevents abstraction. Risky structural choice to hinge everything on a quiet courtroom speech pays off because the emotional cost is visceral.

  * grade_story_wc_317.txt (grade=8.2)
    Corpse-flower-as-business-metaphor is fresh; grafting botanical rarity onto indie-versus-chain conflict feels inevitable in hindsight. Mentor’s posthumous puzzle-seed campaign risks contrivance, yet the specificity of the Titan arum bloom keeps it from template territory. Risk-taking in merging nature spectacle with escape-room design pays off without gimmickry.

  * grade_story_wc_319.txt (grade=8.8)
    Frozen inter-dimensional library feels fresh synthesis of portal-fantasy & bibliophile grief. Conceptual move—making uncertainty a “friend” rather than enemy—flips standard portal-rescue arc. Pendant-as-light-negotiator object avoids cliché cultist tropes; its burn enacts cost. Risk in lyric disorientation pays off with coherent closure under Accumulative lens; stakes stay human-scaled to displacement rather than cosmos-saving.

  * grade_story_wc_32.txt (grade=8.5)

Transformation test fails—story cannot swap places or names without breaking metallurgic detail and twilight ember logic. Risk-taking (burning church relic, alien plant-life) heightens stakes without gimmickry. Specificity—“quicksilver and dove’s blood”—anchors abstraction in verifiable lab debris.

Risk—quiet archive crawl—heightens intimacy without gimmickry. Down from 8.8 only because corporate-flood conspiracy concept itself is familiar; the innovation is execution, not premise core.

Vision feels inevitable in hindsight: every element converges on the charged poise of empty wall, lightness as survival.

The “lingering luminance” concept transforms generic “old vs. new” tropes into a specific metaphysics of memory in matter. Risk-taking (lyric pacing, minimal dialogue, reflective shards) heightens thematic stakes without gimmickry. Every element feels irreplaceable: swap “mist walking” for “teleportation” and the theme collapses. Vision is singular—beauty as resistance—and fully committed.

  * grade_story_wc_31.txt (grade=9.2)

No template echoes; this vision feels singular and inevitable in hindsight.

The core premise—grief as migratory, connective tissue—avoids abstraction by anchoring in Elena’s hands, tools, and stones.
